title: Lawn Mower
summaries: The Lawn Mower is a tool that can be purchased from the Golfer for 1. It mows normal and Hallowed grass. Mowed grass has a different texture, reduces enemy spawn chance, prevents tall grass from growing, and changes how balls move in golfing. The Lawn Mower deals a fixed amount of 8 damage to critters and enemies only while the player is moving. When it is used on grass other than normal and hallowed, it only removes weeds and flowers.

statistics.Tooltip:
Mows Pure and Hallowed grass
Mowed grass reduces enemy spawn chance
statistics.Buy: 1
statistics.Sell: 20
